i1.notes:

q1.name: Overload
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Ryze's''' other [[Champion ability|basic ability]] casts {{sti|cdr|reset}} ''Overload's'' cooldown and charge a ''{{ai|Overload 3|Ryze|Rune}}'' stack that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 2 times.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ryze''' unleashes a runic blast in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and consumes all ''{{ai|Overload 5|Ryze|Rune}}'' stacks.
If '''Ryze''' consumed 2 stacks, he gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.

{{sbc|{{ai|Spell Flux|Ryze|Flux}} Bonus:}} ''Overload'' deals {{pp|type=[[File:Realm Warp.png|20px|border]] Realm Warp's rank|key=%|10 to 100 for 4|0 to 3}} {{ccs|increased damage|magic}} and spreads to surrounding ''Fluxed'' enemies.

Passive: Ryze's other Champion ability casts reset Overload's cooldown and charge a Ryze's Rune stack that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 2 times.
Active: Ryze unleashes a runic blast in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and consumes all Ryze's Rune stacks.
If Ryze consumed 2 stacks, he gains bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

Ryze's Flux Bonus: The target is rooted instead of slowed.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 60% AP) (+ 4% bonus mana)

e1.name: Spell_Flux
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ryze''' projects an orb upon the target enemy that deals {{as|magic damage}}.

The target and surrounding enemies are also marked with ''Flux'' for 3 seconds. '''Ryze's''' basic abilities against ''Flux'' targets consume the mark to become empowered with an additional effect.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ryze projects an orb upon the target enemy that deals magic damage.

The target and surrounding enemies are also marked with Flux for 3 seconds. Ryze's basic abilities against Flux targets consume the mark to become empowered with an additional effect.
Ryze's Flux Bonus: Spell Flux spreads farther.
e1.notes:
* ''Spell Flux's'' second cast on a target will apply a new ''Flux'' debuff as well as triggering the previous one (effectively refreshing the duration).
* {{pending for test}} bounce range {{tip|er|icononly = true}} to-edge or {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} to-center?
** Game data notes additional range checks of 400 (bounce range) and 500 (Q damage bounce range) against 'large' enemies.
* ''Spell Flux'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.

r1.name: Realm_Warp
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ryze''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for 2 seconds to open a portal beneath him, marking the target location as its destination and gaining {{tip|sight}} of the area. '''Ryze''' is able to act while channeling, but the portal will cancel if he is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.

Upon completion, '''Ryze''' and allied units within will {{tip|blink}} to the location and become {{tip|root|rooted}}, {{tip|disarm|disarmed}}, {{tip|silence|silenced}} and {{tip|untargetable}} for {{tt|{{fd|0.75}}|Approximated}} seconds.
''Realm Warp will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Ryze's Overload Ryze's Flux empowered damage is increased.
Active: Ryze channels for 2 seconds to open a portal beneath him, marking the target location as its destination and gaining sight of the area. Ryze is able to act while channeling, but the portal will cancel if he is interrupted.
Upon completion, Ryze and allied units within will blink to the location and become rooted, disarmed, silenced and untargetable for 0.75 seconds.
Realm Warp will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
